alert.note: Alert for Charles City; New Kent (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 6:28PM EST until further notice by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia... Chickahominy River above Providence Forge affecting Charles City and New Kent Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is currently forecast. * WHERE...Chickahominy River above Providence Forge. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, Water is up to 1 FT deep in the garages of an auto parts business along Adkins Rd about 1/2 miles south of the river gauge. Parts of Adkins Rd begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 9.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain just above minor flood stage through Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.0 feet on 01/31/1976. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 630 AM EST.
